ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: should be an integer. The ID of the Telegram Group, where the Leecher should work. Take this from @MissRose_bot. Put Group ID

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

UPLOAD_AS_DOC.description: True/False. If true all files will be uploaded as documents. Default is False.

ARIA_TWO_STARTED_PORT.description: should be an integer. The port on which aria2c daemon must start, and keep listening.

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before editing a message.

MAX_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TORRENTS_TO_START.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before cancelling a torrent.

TG_OFFENSIVE_API.description: should be an URL accepting the FormParams {i}, {m}, and {t}

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Enter your copied text from rclone config. Compulsory for /gleech as well as /tleech command

DESTINATION_FOLDER.description: Enter your Cloud folder NAME(not IDðŸ˜…) in which you want to upload/store your files.

CUSTOM_FILE_NAME.description: fill with name u want to prefix the file name like ur channel usernameðŸ™Š, keep empty for do nothing, but add to ur config vars even without input.

LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom leech command. Default is /leech

GLEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gleech command. Default is /gleech

LEECH_UNZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom leechunzip command. Default is /leechunzip

LEECH_ZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom leechzip command. Default is /leechzip

GLEECH_UNZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gleechunzip command. Default is /gleechunzip

GLEECH_ZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gleechzip command. Default is /gleechzip

YTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom ytdl command. Default is /ytdl

GYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gytdl command. Default is /gytdl

PYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom pytdl command. Default is /pytdl

GPYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gpytdl command. Default is /gpytdl

TELEGRAM_LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom tleech command. Default is /tleech

TELEGRAM_LEECH_UNZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom tleechunzip command. Default is /tleechunzip

CANCEL_COMMAND_G.description: Enter your custom cancel command. Default is /cancel

GET_SIZE_G.description: Enter your custom getsize command. Default is /getsize

STATUS_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom status command. Default is /status

STATS_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom stats command. Default is /stats

HELP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom help command. Default is /help

SAVE_THUMBNAIL.description: Enter your custom savethumbnail command. Default is /savethumbnail

CLEAR_THUMBNAIL.description: Enter your custom clearthumbnail command. Default is /clearthumbnail

CLONE_COMMAND_G.description: Enter your custom clone command. Default is /clone

CLONE_ZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom clonezip command. Default is /clonezip

CLONE_TAR_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom clonetar command. Default is /clonetar

LIST_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom list command. Default is /list

COMPLETE_LIST_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom completelist command. Default is /completelist
